conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a romantic fantasy movie. Could you recommend a few?

While You Were Sleeping is a delightful romantic fantasy about a Chicago Transit Authority ticket booth operator whose life is turned upside down when mistaken for the fiancée of a comatose patient.

The Brothers Bloom features a group of con artists who take on one last job that leads them on a romantic adventure around the world.

A Christmas Carol is a classic animated retelling of the holiday classic that is sure to bring a warm and festive atmosphere to the screen.
